pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information


  • Effective whitening that is safe on enamel.

  • Teeth polishing powder with real deep sea pearls

  • Natural pearl powder: polishes and removes stains gently from teeth enamel.

  • Can be used directly or added to everyday toothpaste to deliver superior teeth whitening.

Size: 30g

Ingredients

Pearl Powder, Calcium Carbonate, Calcium Hydrogen Phosphate, Silicon Dioxide, Trehalose, Sodium Phytate, Citric Acid, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Menthol, Flavour, Mica Powder
